scene_description_enriched: A woman with long, wavy hair, adorned with a diadem and elaborate headwear, stands holding a round, oval object in her left hand. She wears a richly decorated garment with a beaded necklace. Behind her, a stylized flower and celestial bodies (stars and circles) are depicted against a textured background. To the left, a partial view of a column suggests an architectural setting. The overall composition is stylized and symbolic, possibly representing an allegorical figure or a saint.
